title.narrative: Securing the human rights of small-scale fisher peoples through the implementation of the SSF guidelines and the realization of Food Sovereignty

description.narrative: The objective of the intervention is to strengthen the integrity of the World Forum of Fisher Peoples and allied movements and organisations, and to deepen their cooperation and common understanding of a) the political drivers of ocean, land and water grabbing, b) the International Guidelines for Securing Sustainable Small-scale Fisheries (SSF Guidelines - endorsed by the UN Food and Agricultural Organisation (FAO) in 2014), and c) the innovative approaches of Food Sovereignty and Agroecology in a context of small-scale fisheries and other smallholders. The intervention is envisioned to take place back-to-back with the planned General Assembly of World Forum of Fisher Peoples (WFFP) in November 2017.
